channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Kubernetes Credentials Provider Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Kubernetes Credentials Provider Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-24425|2023-10-24T12:48:13.832Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20kubernetes%20credentials%20provider%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Kubernetes Credentials Provider Plugin 1.208.v128ee9800c04 and earlier does not set the appropriate context for Kubernetes credentials lookup, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to access and potentially capture Kubernetes credentials they are not entitled to.
